channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vitamin B3 can help protect against skin cancer. Here's who may benefit
item.description: Dermatologists often recommend nicotinamide — a form of Vitamin B3 — following skin cancer. A study of nearly 34,000 veterans finds this supplement re...

item.title: The Justice Department sues Maine and Oregon, ratcheting up demands for voter data
item.description: The Department of Justice is escalating its demands for sensitive data from voting officials, suing two Democratic-controlled states who have thus far...

item.title: White House moves to scrub national park sites of negative history
item.description: The National Park Service has until Wednesday to address signs that "inappropriately disparage" historical figures. One target is George Washington's ...

item.title: Russia gives Ukrainian kids military training and reeducation, Yale researchers find

item.title: How Charlie Kirk became a leader of the conservative youth movement
item.description: New York Times reporter Robert Draper explains Kirk's rise and legacy. He was killed Sept. 10. Draper also discusses conservative commentator Nick Fue...

item.title: Trump redistricting push threatens minority representation. Black voters worry about its impact
Multiple police officers shot in York County, Shapiro headed to scene
item.description: Multiple officers were shot in in York County, Pennsylvania, Wednesday afternoon, officials say.

item.title: I have no relationship with Trump, Brazil's President Lula tells BBC
item.description: In an exclusive interview, Brazil's president says Trump is "not emperor of the world".

item.title: AI can forecast your future health – just like the weather
item.description: An artificial intelligence model can predict the risk of more than 1,000 diseases, a team of scientists say.

item.title: Kirk killing suspect feared being shot by police and agreed to surrender if peaceful, sheriff says
item.description: Tyler Robinson, the Utah man charged with killing with Charlie Kirk, was afraid of being shot by police and agreed to surrender as long as it was done...

item.title: Suspect in custody after alleged "targeted attack" at FBI Pittsburgh field office
item.description: The FBI is searching for Donald Henson, of Penn Hills, who is accused of ramming his car into the Pittsburgh field office entrance gate.

item.title: Spain arrests 19 on suspicion of torture and murder after 50 disappear from migrant boat
item.description: Police suspect some of the victims were accused of witchcraft by others on the boat that had travelled from Senegal.

item.title: Israeli tanks push into major Gaza City residential area
item.description: The sight of tanks in Sheikh Radwan has caused widespread alarm among residents, with thousands fleeing south.

item.title: 8/13: The Takeout with Major Garrett

item.title: In pictures: US President Donald Trump on second state to UK
item.description: President Trump greeted by the King and Queen and other senior royals at Windsor Castle.
